oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-01-12 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 12, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Little Jimmy Dickens (host/performer), guest performer Hawkshaw Hawkins, and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, Tommy Jackson, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. It is mentioned that Rod Brasfield is in hospital. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Hawkshaw Hawkins; Chet Atkins; Little Jimmy Dickens
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Little Jimmy Dickens, Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Hawkshaw Hawkins -- My Fate Is In Your Hands (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Chet Atkins -- Trambone (Chet Atkins) -- Little Jimmy Dickens talks -- Say It Now (Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Old Hickory Singers; Dickens, Little Jimmy, 1920-; Hawkins, Hawkshaw, 1921-1963
